comment.author: 77936638@N00
comment._content: Contemporary images: www.ditisdenhaag.nl/?tag=venestraat Take note: Veenestraat is in the old spelling, it has dropped one 'e' now. Reisbureau Lindeman was a famous travel agency in the Netherlands.

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/gravlax] Thanks for the information and for linking to the recent photos from the Venestraat street. It seems to have been a shopping street in the 1930s - and still is today. 
/Anna B.
